languages.text: {n}Шестерни внутри священной машины со скрипом и тяжелыми щелчками приходят в движение. Уставшие духи машины даруют вам доступ к управлению станцией — теми ее частями, что все еще подвластны духам когитатора.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Шестерни внутри священной машины со скрипом и тяжелыми щелчками приходят в движение. Уставшие духи машины даруют вам доступ к управлению станцией — теми ее частями, что все еще подвластны духам когитатора.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The cogs within the sacred mechanism slowly start turning with heavy grinding and clacking. The tired machine spirits grant you access to the station control — or at least its parts that still obey the cogitator.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Шестерни внутри священной машины со скрипом и тяжелыми щелчками приходят в движение. Уставшие духи машины даруют вам доступ к управлению станцией — теми ее частями, что все еще подвластны духам когитатора.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The cogs within the sacred mechanism slowly start grinding, squealing and clicking. The tired machine spirits grant you access to the control of the station — or at least the parts that still obey the cogitator.{/n}

{n}The cogs within the sacred mechanism slowly start grinding, squealing and clicking. The tired machine spirits grant you access to the control of the station — or at least the parts that still obey the cogitator.{/n}

{n}The cogs within the sacred mechanism slowly start turning with heavy grinding and clacking. The tired machine spirits grant you access to the station control — or at least its parts that still obey the cogitator.{/n}

{n}The cogs within the sacred mechanism slowly start turning with heavy grinding and clacking. The tired machine spirits grant you access to the station control — or at least its parts that still obey the cogitator.{/n}

{n}The cogs within the sacred mechanism slowly start turning with heavy grinding and clacking. The tired machine spirits grant you access to the station control — or at least its parts that still obey the cogitator.{/n}

{n}The cogs within the sacred mechanism slowly start turning with heavy grinding and clacking. The tired machine spirits grant you access to the station control — or at least its parts that still obey the cogitator.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Zahnräder im Inneren des heiligen Mechanismus beginnen langsam und mit schwerem Knarzen und Klackern, sich zu drehen. Der müde Maschinengeist gewährt dir Zugang zur Stationskontrolle — oder zumindest zu den Teilen, die dem Cogitator noch gehorchen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogs within the sacred mechanism slowly start turning with heavy grinding and clacking. The tired machine spirits grant you access to the station control — or at least its parts that still obey the cogitator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Zahnräder im Inneren des heiligen Mechanismus beginnen langsam und mit schwerem Knarzen und Klackern, sich zu drehen. Der müde Maschinengeist gewährt dir Zugang zur Stationskontrolle — oder zumindest zu den Teilen, die dem Cogitator noch gehorchen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les rouages du mécanisme sacré se mettent à tourner lentement en grinçant et en claquant bruyamment. Les esprits de la machine fatigués vous donnent accès au système de contrôle de la station, ou du moins aux parties qui obéissent encore au cogitateur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogs within the sacred mechanism slowly start turning with heavy grinding and clacking. The tired machine spirits grant you access to the station control — or at least its parts that still obey the cogitator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les rouages du mécanisme sacré se mettent à tourner lentement en grinçant et en claquant bruyamment. Les esprits de la machine fatigués vous donnent accès au système de contrôle de la station, ou du moins aux parties qui obéissent encore au cogitateur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}神圣机械中的齿轮开始缓慢转动，发出沉重的磨擦声和咔嗒声。疲惫的机魂允许你访问星站控制系统，或者说，允许你访问依然听从沉思者命令的相关区域。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogs within the sacred mechanism slowly start turning with heavy grinding and clacking. The tired machine spirits grant you access to the station control — or at least its parts that still obey the cogitator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}神圣机械中的齿轮开始缓慢转动，发出沉重的磨擦声和咔嗒声。疲惫的机魂允许你访问星站控制系统，或者说，允许你访问依然听从思考器命令的相关区域。{/n}

languages.text: {n}神聖な機械の中の歯車が、激しく擦れ合いカタカタと音を立てゆっくり回転し始める。疲弊した機械精霊はステーションのコントロールへのアクセスを許可した。少なくとも、今も考算機に従っている部分にアクセスできるようになった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogs within the sacred mechanism slowly start turning with heavy grinding and clacking. The tired machine spirits grant you access to the station control — or at least its parts that still obey the cogitator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}神聖な機械の中の歯車が、激しく擦れ合いカタカタと音を立てゆっくり回転し始める。疲れた機械精霊はステーションのコントロールへのアクセスを許可した。おかげで少なくとも、今も考算機に従っている部分はアクセスできる。{/n}
{n}神聖な機械の中の歯車が、激しく擦れ合いカタカタと音を立てゆっくり回転し始める。疲弊した機械精霊はステーションのコントロールへのアクセスを許可した。少なくとも、今も考算機に従っている部分にアクセスできるようになった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los engranajes del mecanismo sagrado empiezan a girar con un rechinar y un chasquido espantosos. La cansada máquina te permite acceder a los controles de la estación. Por lo menos, a las partes que aún obedecen al cogitador.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogs within the sacred mechanism slowly start turning with heavy grinding and clacking. The tired machine spirits grant you access to the station control — or at least its parts that still obey the cogitator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los engranajes del mecanismo sagrado empiezan a girar con un rechinar y un chasquido espantosos. La cansada máquina te permite acceder a los controles de la estación. Por lo menos, a las partes que aún obedecen al cogitador.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kutsal mekanizmanın içindeki dişliler, ağır gıcırtı ve çatırtı sesleri eşliğinde yavaşça dönmeye başlıyor. Yorgun makine ruhları, istasyon kontrollerine, en azından kavramsayara hâlâ itaat eden kısımlarına erişmeni sağlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogs within the sacred mechanism slowly start turning with heavy grinding and clacking. The tired machine spirits grant you access to the station control — or at least its parts that still obey the cogitator.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kutsal mekanizmanın içindeki dişliler, ağır gıcırtı ve çatırtı sesleri eşliğinde yavaşça dönmeye başlıyor. Yorgun makine ruhları, istasyon kontrollerine, en azından kavramsayara hâlâ itaat eden kısımlarına erişmeni sağlıyor.{/n}
